alert.note: Alert for Logan; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 10:50PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wallace and southwestern Logan Counties through 1015 PM MDT/1115 PM CDT/... At 950 PM MDT/1050 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles south of Wallace, or 10 miles southeast of Sharon Springs, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Wallace and southwestern Logan Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT/100 AM CDT/ for west central Kansas.
